name: Nijien High School Host Club
description:
This is a fan visual novel made on a whim in a few hours spread across a few days. It is set in high school, starring Nijisanji English's Luxiem and Petra, and you!

The base concept is inspired by the Ouran High School Host Club anime.

This game is UNFINISHED; there's only one complete joke route and a longer common route. Only time will tell if I'll be able to execute the larger scope that's in my brain. This is more of a practice project and proof of concept that, although incomplete, I think is still fun to share.

Credits:
• Made with Ren'Py
• Scuffed character art, writing, and coding by Dani - Twitter
• All environment art originally by Uncle Mugen - Lemmasoft forum post
• All music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org
• Sound effects by Mixkit and Soundjay
• NIJISANJI EN, Luxiem, Petra - ANYCOLOR Inc.

This fan game is a work of fiction. No harm is intended.
